properties.name: options
properties.value: {autoSize: true,data: getData(),series: [{xKey: 'time',yKey: 'voltage'}],axes: [{type: 'time',position: 'bottom',tick: { count: agCharts.time.second.every(5) },label: { format: '%H:%M:%S' }},{type: 'number',position: 'left',label: { format: '#{.2f}V' }}],title: { text: 'Core Voltage' },legend: { enabled: false }}

globals: var lastTime = new Date('07 Jan 2020 13:25:00 GMT').getTime();
function getData() {data.shift();while (data.length < 20) {data.push({time: new Date(lastTime += 1000),voltage: 1.1 + Math.random() / 2});}return data;}
